title: Search mail
creator: dev.zalicja
content: Hi, when I search for emails from "name person," the search does not return results. When I search by email address, it does not find emails from that person but instead finds emails from other people. It isn't working? ðŸ«¥ðŸ¤”

title: Email from Aliexpress are not fully showed in Thunderbird for Android in Dark Theme
creator: 0nebukadnezar0
content: Hi, some emails are not readable or better say visible in Thunderbird for Android in Dark Mode. In Light mode it's fully visible (see Screenshots). Is it an issue in Thunderbird, or it's a problem of the email format?
